analysis.key_quote: I do not want to live in a world where the non-political work of government is in turmoil every election; the federal workers who are experts in their fields and keep our government systems running regardless of which political party is in the White House are important to the functioning of our country; making these jobs politicized will be harmful to services provided to the public as well as harmful to the workforce.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by expressing concerns about the politicization of civil service jobs and the potential harm to government services and workforce stability.
